title: Verify correctness after Rust rewrite
description: Systematic edge case and correctness review. Search was broken (no text indexing) until fix. What else is wrong? Test: incremental update, file deletion, merge_from_subdir, stale detection, parent index search, file refs (file#name, file:line), all output formats, error messages, exit codes, HHG_AUTO_BUILD, threshold filtering, type filtering, exclude patterns, code-only flag. Run on real repos.

logs.msg: Found critical bug: search_multi_with_text returned empty because store() doesn't index text for BM25. Fixed by adding index_text() to omendb and calling it after store() in hhg. Also found target/ not in .gitignore causing 1165 files indexed instead of 69. Both fixed.
